description: This table is a continuation of related table OTP_INFO. It stores additional information about a treatment plan order, such as verbal signing information, inpatient medication information, etc.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: TRANSPORTATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transportation type associated with the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IP_DISC_INTERVAL_ID
columns.description: The discrete interval associated with the order template in this row.

columns.name: IP_DISC_INTERVAL_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: IP_STANDING_COUNT
columns.description: The standing count associated with the order template in this row.

columns.name: IP_STAND_CNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The inpatient standing count type (Dose/Days/etc) associated with the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Days


Weeks


Hours


Occurrences

columns.name: IP_INCLUDE_NOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The frequency associated with the order template in this row, for example, "Include Now", "As Scheduled", "At Nurse Discretion."


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Include Now


As Scheduled


At Nurse Discretion

columns.name: SCHED_EXTRA_DOSE_TM
columns.description: The time at which to schedule the first occurrence of the associated order template in this row.

columns.name: COST_CENTER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the cost center associated with the order template in this row.

columns.name: COST_CENTER_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the cost center.

columns.name: ORDERING_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ordering mode (inpatient or outpatient) of the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Outpatient


Inpatient

columns.name: SELF_ADMIN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the order template in this row is self-administered. �Y� indicates that the order template in this row is self-administered. �N� or NULL indicate that the order template in this row is not self-administered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PAT_SUPP_MED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the order template in this row is a patient supplied medication. �Y� indicates that the order template in this row is a patient supplied medication. �N� or NULL indicate that the order template in this row is not a patient supplied medication.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SELF_ADMIN_YN

columns.name: PAT_SUPPLIED_DOSES
columns.description: The number of patient supplied doses.

columns.name: CALC_DOSE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The calculated dose to administer for the order template in this row.

columns.name: CALC_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The units for the calculated dose to administer for the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOSE_CALC_INFO
columns.description: The dose calculation information for the order template in this row.

columns.name: ADMIN_DOSE
columns.description: The amount to administer for the medication in this order template.

columns.name: ADMIN_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The units to use with the amount to administer for the medication in this order template.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: VERB_ORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verbal order type for the order template in this row. For example, Ordering, Cosign, or Discontinuing.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ordering


Cosign


Discontinuing


Pending Discontinue


Edit


Delete


Continue on Transfer


Discontinue on Transfer


New on Transfer


Unreview on Transfer


Holding


Unholding


Order and Hold


Assigning Administration Responsibility

columns.name: VERB_ORD_COMM_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the verbal order communicator for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_SIGNER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the verbal order signer for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_MSGRCP_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the verbal order message recipient for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_MSG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the verbal order message.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_SIGN_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the verbal order was signed.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verbal order mode of the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verbal


Standard

columns.name: ORD_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the ordering provider for the order template in this row.

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorizing provider for the order template in this row.

columns.name: CALC_RATE_FRM_VD_YN
columns.description:
Indicated whether or not to calculate rate given volume and duration. "Y" indicates that the rate will be calculated. "N" indicates that rate will not be calculated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CONDITION_FLAG
columns.description: The condition flag for the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_DOSE_PP_DESC
columns.description: The free text description of the dose calculation for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_ISOLATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The isolation category for the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: OTP_CODESTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code status for the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


<Disabled>


Full Code


DNR


Partial Code

columns.name: CODESTATUS_COMMENT
columns.description: The code status comments for the order template in this row.

columns.name: DIET_C_NAME
columns.description:
The diet specified in the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DIET_COMMENTS
columns.description: The diet comments in the order template in this row.

columns.name: DOSE_ADJ_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This contains the type of dose adjustment - maximum, minimum, or standardized.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Maximum Dose


Minimum Dose


Minimum and Maximum Adjustment

columns.name: DOSE_ADJ_OVERRID_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether dose adjustment in I OTP 34180 was overridden. "Y" indicates that dose adjustment was overridden. "N" indicates that dose adjustment was not overridden.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_RATE_FRM_VD_YN

columns.name: EFQ_OVRD_DAY_TYPE
columns.description: If column EFQ_OVRD_REL_DAYS in table OTP_FREQ_OV_REL_D is populated, this item specifies what the numeric values in that item represent. If this item's value is 1, then column EFQ_OVRD_CYCL_LEN stores relative days, otherwise OTP_FREQ_OV_REL_D  stores weekdays.

columns.name: EFQ_OVRD_CYCL_LEN
columns.description: If EFQ_OVRD_DAY_TYPE is 1 (meaning the override times stored in the record are relative cycles), then this item stores the length of the cycle.

columns.name: ORX_ID
columns.description: Networked Order Lookup Index Panel ID of an order template record applied to a patient.

columns.name: ORX_ID_ORDER_LOOKUP_NAME
columns.description: The name (.2 item) for the order panel record.

columns.name: CSGN_CREATE_DTTM
columns.description: When the cosign requirement was created (UTC Time).

columns.name: DFI_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Deficiency Instance record associated with the cosignature requirement for this order.

columns.name: CSGN_RQRD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores a yes/no flag for if an action requires a cosign (I OTP 34856).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Administratively Closed

columns.name: MEDS_ACTION_VERB_C_NAME
columns.description:
Action verb which is used in patient sig of the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_NEEDED_YN
columns.description:
Stores if an order needs prior authorization.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_RATE_FRM_VD_YN

columns.name: UNROUNDED_DOSE_MIN
columns.description: The unrounded dose of this order. If the dose has a range (e.g. 1-2 mg), this is the lower end of the range. If the dose does not have a range, then this will store the dose.

columns.name: UNROUNDED_DOSE_MAX
columns.description: The unrounded dose of this order. If the dose has a range (e.g. 1-2 mg), this is the upper end of the range. Otherwise, this is null.

columns.name: UNROUND_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dose unit category ID for the unrounded dose of this order.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: TO_PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: The pharmacy that the order will be sent to.

columns.name: MLSIG_SIGTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of sig being used.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


SIMPLE


THEN


AND


THEN-AND

columns.name: COLLECTED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: This is the user who collected the specimen.
